comments:
Several people working with M8 have reported that they have gotten into a 
state where the following NPE was being logged repeatedly.  Unfortunately I 
don't have repro steps.  Not sure if the StructuralComponentBuilder is always 
involved, at least one person reported the stack without the SCB in the stack.

I know a lot's been changed since M8, but wanted to get this logged.

https://bugs.eclipse.org/bugs/show_bug.cgi?id=109233
looks like it could be related.
This builder is removed in M9 so this should resolve the issue.

This bug is being moved to the "closed" state since it has been in the fixed state for a so long it is being assumed fixed, without explicit verification from the originator. If there is still a problem, in the most recent 1.5.x builds, please reopen or open another bug.
